message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in your future and success. Given its worth of $1200000 to you, I am extending a special offer to purchase it at a highly competitive price of $1050000. This represents a significant saving of $150000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I am confident that this offer will enable you to secure this valuable asset at a price that is both favorable and within your budget. Should you decide to proceed, I assure you of a smooth and professional transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.
